mapper.sql: type AS "type", detail_id AS "detailId", task_id AS "taskId", content_json AS "contentJson", status AS "status", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from asyn_task_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskId},'%')
and content_json like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contentJson},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
